headline: How Cloudflare uses Cloudflare Spectrum: A look into an internâ€™s project at Cloudflare
keywords: Spectrum, Product News, Internship Experience, Salt
description: As part of my onboarding as an intern on the Spectrum (a layer 4 reverse proxy) team, I learned that many internal services dogfood Spectrum, as they are exposed to the Internet and benefit from layer 4 DDoS protection.
